ICameraDevice

Base interface shared across all camera types

Header

import Cameras.CameraBase.ICamera;

Functions
NextVideoFrame
virtual bool NextVideoFrame(
IImage** ppColorImage
) = 0

Retrieves the next color/depth/ir image from the camera Parameters: ppColorImage - returns the next color image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.

NextAudioFrame
virtual bool NextAudioFrame(
IAudioFrame** ppAudioFrame
) = 0

Retrieves the next audio frame from the audio device Parameters: ppAudioFrame - returns the next audio frame retrieved from the audio device. Maybe nullptr.

GetColorWidth
virtual uint32 GetColorWidth() = 0

Returns the width in pixels of the color image returned by the camera

Returns

Width of the color image in pixels

GetColorHeight
virtual uint32 GetColorHeight() = 0

Returns the height in pixels of the color image returned by the camera

Returns

Height of the color image in pixels
